title.rendered: College Career Centers of Western Massachusetts CAREER FAIR, 2019

content.rendered:
Find ClinLab Staffing today at the College Career Centers of Western Massachusetts CAREER FAIR, 2019 at the Blake Arena in Springfield, MA. We are hiring entry level Scientific Recruiters and Life Science/Biotech professionals.

Entry Level Recruiters Apply here.
Life Science and Biotech Professionals Apply here.
